item.title: Shiny Dashboard and Exploring Monte Carlo Simulations
item.description: Shiny Dashboard: In this section, I developed an interactive Shiny app that facilitates data exploration and visualization or car data. The Shiny app allows users to choose any combination of two variables from the dataset and generates different types of plots based on the variable types. For numeric variables, a scatterplot is displayed, for a combination of a categorical variable and a numerical variable, a boxplot is shown, and for two categorical variables, a barplot or count plot is generated.
